text: Antonio Tarsia (July 28, 1643 – 1722) was an Italian composer.Salvator Žitko, Antonio Tarsia 1993 Tarsia was born in Koper, Slovenia. He was the major composer of the early Baroque in Ljubljana and left a large amount of Latin sacred compositions.Barocco padano: Atti del XII convegno internazionale sulla musica Alberto Colzani, Andrea Luppi, Maurizio Padoan - 2002 He died in Koper, Slovenia. :To be distinguished from Antonio Tarsia (Venice 1662-1739) an Italian sculptor. ==References== Category:Italian composers Category:Italian male composers Category:1643 births Category:1722 deaths Category:People from Pula
title: Antonio Tarsia (composer)
